title: The Hunter and Other Stories of Men
description: A property developer fears that a burgeoning ibis population will prevent the construction of a high rise apartment complex; a bus stop outside a dementia care facility in Düsseldorf suffers its own identity crisis; a young man’s new job requires him to pose as a woodcutter and wave at a trainload of tourists; an aging, reclusive archivist becomes locked in a strange battle of wills with a courier; a backpacker in Israel has a bizarre religious experience.  In these award winning stories, David Cohen explores the oddities of human behaviour with wit, affection and startling brilliance.   ‘AN EXCEPTIONAL WRITER ’ Newtown Review of Books
author: David Cohen
